Articles.Content:
EnginesPlus

So, what is the EnginesPlus mod? Well, it is a mod designed to add more variations of each engine! For example, we have the Mainsail, Skipper and the poodle, and in KSP right now, there's the Reliant / Swivel and the Terrier, so the 1.25m variant of the Skipper is missing! That's the basic example.

So right now in version 0.8 of this mod, it has four engines and they are the **"Private"** the **"Rottweiler"** the **"Vase"** and the **"Tsar"**

![B6vFzrd.png](http://i.imgur.com/B6vFzrd.png)

I think one more engine will do! Give me suggestions! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Changelog:

    0.8
    
    Added a 2.5 Nuke called Tsar. 1 update more until the official release of this mod! 
    
    0.6
    
    Added a 0.625 Nuke called Vase
    
    0.4
    
    Fixed a bug where in the VAB/SPH the fairings are visible. Thanks wasml!
    Added the Rottweiler
    
    0.2
    
    Initial Release,
    Added Private.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-05-19T18:52:15Z" title="05/19/2021 06:52  PM" data-short="3 yr">May 19, 2021</time> by Snark**
  
Link to defunct website removed by moderator

Yay, MOAR mods!

But seriously, good job, and get some rep.

Have you seen this link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE)

About half way down the page under "Engine Fairings" is the line "To make fairings in VAB/SPH thumbnail invisible, set the fairing objects tag to Icon\_Hidden. You will need to create a new tag to do this." followed by a link.
You've already done better than me for a mod with custom models. I'm still learning Blender, Unity, and Wings :/

> 
> Yay, MOAR mods!
> But seriously, good job, and get some rep.

Thank you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Have you seen this link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE)
> About half way down the page under "Engine Fairings" is the line "To make fairings in VAB/SPH thumbnail invisible, set the fairing objects tag to Icon\_Hidden. You will need to create a new tag to do this." followed by a link.

Oh, alright, I'll do it in the morning because I am about to sleep now ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> You've already done better than me for a mod with custom models. I'm still learning Blender, Unity, and Wings :/

I could teach you, but I don't know how to make gimbals or custom fx, if that's what you are looking for. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

AstroGamer It's ok. We all learn in our own time. If you tried to teach me, like everyone else, you'd get fed up with me ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> AstroGamer It's ok. We all learn in our own time. If you tried to teach me, like everyone else, you'd get fed up with me ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Ahahaha! You're right, when I was looking for help, I thought I was a nuisance. XD

> 
> Have you seen this link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE)
> About half way down the page under "Engine Fairings" is the line "To make fairings in VAB/SPH thumbnail invisible, set the fairing objects tag to Icon\_Hidden. You will need to create a new tag to do this." followed by a link.

Is that in Unity or another program?

Afraid I can't help - I've never done an engine mod myself - just recalled seeing the link and thought it looked like it might be relevant to what you're trying to do.

That said if you pull up Unity there is a "Tag" field just under the "Inspector" tab - Top right corner in default configuration.

> 
> Afraid I can't help - I've never done an engine mod myself - just recalled seeing the link and thought it looked like it might be relevant to what you're trying to do.
> That said if you pull up Unity there is a "Tag" field just under the "Inspector" tab - Top right corner in default configuration.

You're a bit late you know. XD

I fixed it. I also thanked you in the changelog. :3

Also, New Update! Fixed a fairing bug and a new engine was added!
New update! I have added a 0.625 nuclear engine for all of your probes!
What should I add next?

Yes, this is awesome! Also, IDK what you should add next.

EDIT: Wait... what about a 50 thrust side attachable engine? And 2.5 meter SRBs!

> 
> Yes, this is awesome! Also, IDK what you should add next.
> EDIT: Wait... what about a 50 thrust side attachable engine? And 2.5 meter SRBs!

I don't know how to make those, but thanks for the suggestion. I'm glad you like this mod too! I'm very proud of it. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
New update! Added the Tsar, a 2.5m nuclear engine! On update closer to release, people! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Yay again!

Wait, you should start using this mod in your YT series!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-29T20:42:34Z" title="06/29/2015 08:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 29, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

> 
> Yay again!
> Wait, you should start using this mod in your YT series!

Already going up in the next episode. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Anyone have any engine ideas?
2m Aerospike.

> 
> 2m Aerospike.

Now that is something I did not expect! Thank you for your suggestion, I'll work on that soon! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
